div.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbooks, Vol. I, Owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago, Ill. Hull House, Corner Halsted and Polk Sts.GREAT MASSMEETING

body.p: On Sunday, Feb. 10, 1918, at 2:30 P. M., Professor U. V. Lomonosov will report on conditions in Russia; also, what we Russians can do for Russia at present.

Everyone who is interested in Russia; who wants to know what is happening there and what part we can play to help our brothers and sisters in Russia, should be present at this massmeeting. Admission is free.
